018package com.github.tommyettinger.tantrum.jdkgdxds;
019
020import com.github.tommyettinger.ds.IntBag;
021import com.github.tommyettinger.tantrum.digital.helpers.Support;
022import org.apache.fory.Fory;
023import org.apache.fory.memory.MemoryBuffer;
024import org.apache.fory.serializer.Serializer;
025import org.apache.fory.memory.Platform;
026
027/**
028 * Fory {@link Serializer} for jdkgdxds {@link IntBag}s.
029 */
030public class IntBagSerializer extends Serializer<IntBag> {
031
032    public IntBagSerializer(Fory fory) {
033        super(fory, IntBag.class);
034    }
035
036    @Override
037    public void write(final MemoryBuffer output, final IntBag data) {
038        output.writePrimitiveArrayWithSize(data.items, Platform.INT_ARRAY_OFFSET, data.size() << 2);
039    }
040
041    @Override
042    public IntBag read(MemoryBuffer input) {
043        return new IntBag(Support.readIntsAndSize(input));
044    }
045}
